title: ShoeRace GO!
description: My first Mobile App that i published on Google Play in 2020. It is advanced in terms of monitoring the users activity in different sections of the app and sending the data to the sever. Had support for the in-app purchases which included: removing the ads or buying gems. Now it is unfortunately unavailable on the grounds that i have not updated its terms of condition.
